name: Malcubus
description: Malcubus is a medium-sized fiend possessing a cunning and challenging presence in combat, characterized by its ability to charm and manipulate others.
memorable: Its ability to drain life force through a kiss while charming adversaries makes it a significant threat.
goals: To charm and manipulate creatures to serve or obey its commands.
relations: May be encountered with other fiends or as a servant to more powerful malevolent entities.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy places or on the Ethereal Plane.
strengths: High Charisma aids in charm and manipulation, with resistance to various damage types.
weaknesses: Average physical combat abilities, making it less effective in direct melee encounters.
attacks: Claw attack inflicts slashing and necrotic damage; charms a target to compel obedience; draining kiss deals psychic damage and heals the Malcubus.
most_powerful_ability: Draining Kiss allows it to inflict significant psychic damage while healing itself.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, allowing it to be aware of subtle threats.
skills: Proficient in deception and persuasion, enhancing its manipulative capabilities.
additional_information: The 'Cloaked Mind' ability makes it difficult to detect.
Can shapeshift into Medium or Small humanoids.
Etherealness provides escape options and strategic advantages.
Telepathic Bond enables communication across distances.
Dream ability disrupts targets' rest and offers opportunities for manipulation.
test_queries: fiend with charm abilities and flight
crafty fiend that drains life with a kiss
agile fiend with telepathic bond capability
malcubus abilities for mind control and escape
